original_text: So the Lord was with Joshua; and his fame was noised throughout all the country.
korean_text: 여호와께서 여호수아와 함께 하시니 여호수아의 소문이 그 온 땅에 퍼지니라

sentences.original_text: So the Lord was with Joshua
and his fame was noised throughout all the country
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 명성은 온 땅에 두루 퍼졌더라
